author: intrepid42
body:
#### PR description:

Fixes crash in GenParticles2HepMCConverter (#28803) by adding fake beam particles for exotic LHE files with only one beam-particle candidate. This was used for NeutrinoGun samples (no beam particles) before.

#### PR validation:

* Processed NanoAod from problematic events
* Processed MiniAod events to produce Rivet histograms

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No PR in `master` yet. I tried the same tests there but both failed:
* NanoAod
```An exception of category 'NoProxyException' occurred while
   [0] Processing  Event run: 1 lumi: 1 event: 5 stream: 0
   [1] Running path 'nanoAOD_step'
   [2] Calling method for module PATTauDiscriminationByMVAIsolationRun2/'patTauDiscriminationByIsolationMVArun2v1DBoldDMwLTraw'
Exception Message:
No data of type "GBRForest" with label "RecoTauTag_tauIdMVAIsoDBoldDMwLT" in record "GBRWrapperRcd"
 Please add an ESSource or ESProducer to your job which can deliver this data.
```

* RivetAnalyzer::endRun fails with gcc820? (Rivet 3 integration was done using 11_0_0_preX using gcc700)
```cmsRun: RivetYODA.cc:52: typename T::Ptr Rivet::Wrapper<T>::active() const [with T = YODA::Counter; typename T::Ptr = std::shared_ptr<YODA::Counter>]: Assertion `false && "No activ
e pointer set. Was this object booked in init()?"' failed.```
title: Fix #28803 (GenParticles2HepMC with exotic LHE)
